Button.UpstairShort: click to get up one storey
Button.DownstairShort: click to get down one storey
Button.InverseShort: click to inverse view of clipping

Spinbox.ElevationShort: Elevation that will define each storey
Spinbox.NumbersShort: Enters the numbers of storey that need to be created
Spinbox.OffsetShort: Base elevation for first storey, others will be computed based on this first storey

RequestWarningNotif.DriverLoadingFail: Driver found but failed to read levels information. Loading storeys from product structure, please wait...
RequestWarningNotif.DriverMissing: Driver not found. Loading storeys from product structure, please wait...
